name: Morgan Sea Flash Doll
description:
I made this Paper Doll in 2006.

There is not much to it;
I made this for a programming class at art school.
I was 21 and attempting social transition,
so this was a sort of "you choose what I look like" game.
I presented it in a 'queer-art' group show about identity...
that was probably 80 percent allies.

It's been sitting on photobucket for 10 years.
I don't have access to that account
so I thought I better archive it here too.
